mapper.select: select mem_name from io_member where mem_id = #{mem_id} and mem_pw = #{mem_pw}

select mem_id, mem_name, mem_birth, mem_email, mem_phone, mem_add, mem_add1
from io_member where mem_id = #{mem_id} and mem_pw = #{mem_pw}
mapper.insert: insert into io_member (mem_id, mem_pw, mem_email, mem_name, mem_birth, mem_phone, mem_sex, mem_add, mem_add1) values (#{mem_id},#{mem_pw},#{mem_email},#{mem_name},#{mem_birth},#{mem_phone},#{mem_sex},#{mem_add},#{mem_add1})

insert into io_resume (res_num, mem_id, res_lev, res_school, res_stdate, res_stdatesub, res_area, res_enddate, res_enddatesub, res_major, res_shiftpattern, res_income, res_workarea, res_too, res_tob, res_rep_area, res_rep_too, res_make_date, res_title, res_seekwork) values (null, #{mem_id},#{res_lev},#{res_school},#{res_stdate},#{res_stdatesub},#{res_area},#{res_enddate}, #{res_enddatesub},#{res_major},#{res_shiftpattern},#{res_income},#{res_workarea}, #{res_too},#{res_tob},#{res_rep_area},#{res_rep_too}, #{res_make_date},#{res_title},#{res_seekwork})

insert into io_university (un_num, res_num, mem_id, un_un, un_name, un_area, un_stdate, un_stdatesub, un_enddate, un_enddatesub, un_mainmajor, un_majordept, un_time, un_grade, un_fixgrade, un_piece) values(null, #{res_num}, #{mem_id}, #{un_un}, #{un_name}, #{un_area}, #{un_stdate}, #{un_stdatesub}, #{un_enddate}, #{un_enddatesub}, #{un_mainmajor}, #{un_majordept}, #{un_time}, #{un_grade}, #{un_fixgrade}, #{un_piece})

insert into io_carrer (car_num, res_num, mem_id, car_name, car_stdate, car_enddate, car_enddatesub, car_resign, car_position, car_too, car_year, car_workarea, car_dept, car_income, car_incomesub, car_res_bus, car_pro_name, car_pro_stdate, car_pro_enddate, car_pro_contents) values(null, #{res_num},#{mem_id},#{car_name},#{car_stdate},#{car_enddate},#{car_enddatesub},#{car_resign},#{car_position},#{car_too},#{car_year},#{car_workarea}, #{car_dept},#{car_income},#{car_incomesub},#{car_res_bus},#{car_pro_name},#{car_pro_stdate},#{car_pro_enddate},#{car_pro_contents})
